title: NCIS season 17: Ziva return details – a Tony reunion is coming…
text:
Cote de Pablo will be returning for more NCIS episodes later in the season (Picture: CBS)

The return of Ziva David (Cote de Pablo) has been one of the most talked-about events during season 17 of NCIS.

After an initial starring role in two episodes, the drama will be bringing the character back for more – and she may finally get to reunite with lover Tony.

After a now-iconic meeting between Ziva, Bishop and Torres at the start of season 17, the former main character left after Gibbs (Mark Harmon) got a phone call from Ziva’s former lover Tony (Michael Weatherly)

The former NCIS agent is currently on the run and trying to clear her name after being declared a terror threat. Fans saw her exit as she swore to clear her name and return to her family a free woman.

Tony (left) and Ziva (right) may finally be reuniting (Picture: Getty)

She may be gone now, but showrunners are already bracing fans for her seemingly inevitable return. And yes, a ‘Tiva’ reunion is probably 100% happening.

‘There will be four episodes [with Ziva],’ producer Frank Gardea told Parade Magazine (via Newsweek). ‘Two early on, and two in fall/winter.’

‘We’re very well aware of the Tony-Ziva connection,’ added exec Steven Binder. ‘And the fans desire and response to it.’

Cote de Pablo’s return as Ziva was on the cards for quite some time (Picture: CBS)

That means that fans have already seen the first two instalments…and there’s two left to go. Given that Tony got into contact with Gibbs about Ziva, we know it won’t be long until the star-crossed lovers are reunited – probably in the most dramatic and heart-wrenching way possible.

Cote de Pablo herself also previously shared the news that her character would only be back for a short stint in the high-octane drama, but her return has been on the cards for some time.

‘This time they wanted to really have a serious discussion about where I thought the character had been in the past five years,’ the actress said. ‘And how we could potentially create a complex and fun storyline to bring the character back.’

NCIS is broadcast on Fox UK and is also available to stream on NOW TV.
